featured.text: Once the pests detect the chemical fog in the room, they’ll hide themselves in walls or other hideaways, where you’ll never be able to treat them effectively.
They are stony structures full of dark hideaways where fish and sea animals can lay their eggs and 31 from predators.

definition.en_def: A place where one can hide or seek refuge.
definition.example: They found a cozy hideaway in the mountains to escape the city.
